tasks.title: Infrastructure Setup with Kubernetes Operators
tasks.description: Set up infrastructure using Kubernetes operators: PostgreSQL (CloudNative-PG), Redis/Valkey, Kafka (Strimzi), MongoDB (Percona), RabbitMQ

tasks.title: Notification Router Service (Rust/Axum)
tasks.description: High-performance notification routing service with REST API, WebSocket support, rate limiting, priority queues, and deduplication. Endpoints: POST /api/v1/notifications, GET /api/v1/notifications/:id, WS /api/v1/ws

tasks.title: Admin API Service (Go/gRPC)
tasks.description: Management API for tenants, users, rules, and analytics using gRPC with grpc-gateway for REST. Services: TenantService, UserService, RuleService, AnalyticsService

tasks.title: Integration Service (Bun/Elysia + Effect)
tasks.description: Channel delivery service for Slack, Discord, Email, Push, and Webhooks using Effect TypeScript for type-safe error handling. Endpoints for integration CRUD and testing

tasks.title: Web Console (Next.js + Effect)
tasks.description: Primary configuration interface with dashboard, notification history, integrations management, rules builder, and analytics. Using Next.js 15 App Router, React 19, shadcn/ui, TailwindCSS, Effect

tasks.title: Mobile App (Expo/React Native)
tasks.description: Mobile app for push notifications and preferences using Expo SDK 50+, NativeWind. Screens: Home, NotificationDetail, Integrations, Settings, Profile. Features: biometric auth, offline caching

tasks.title: Desktop Client (Electron)
tasks.description: System tray application for desktop notifications using Electron 28+, React, TailwindCSS. Features: tray icon with badge, native notifications, keyboard shortcuts, auto-start

tasks.title: Quality Review - Backend Services
tasks.description: Code review and quality checks for Rex (Rust), Grizz (Go), and Nova (Bun) backend services

tasks.title: Quality Review - Frontend Applications
tasks.description: Code review and quality checks for Blaze (Next.js), Tap (Expo), and Spark (Electron) frontend applications

tasks.title: Security Audit - Backend Services
tasks.description: Security scan and vulnerability check for Rex, Grizz, and Nova backend services

tasks.title: Security Audit - Frontend Applications
tasks.description: Security scan for Blaze, Tap, and Spark frontend applications including XSS, CSP, CORS checks

tasks.title: Testing - Backend Services
tasks.description: Write unit and integration tests for Rex, Grizz, and Nova backend services

tasks.title: Testing - Frontend Applications
tasks.description: Write tests for Blaze (Playwright E2E), Tap (Jest/Detox), and Spark (Jest) frontend applications

tasks.title: Integration - Backend Services
tasks.description: Resolve conflicts and merge PRs for Rex, Grizz, and Nova backend services

tasks.title: Integration - Frontend Applications
tasks.description: Resolve conflicts and merge PRs for Blaze, Tap, and Spark frontend applications
